documents.document: @MatchRagamuffin Beautiful work! I particularly love the animation on Arin when he does his 'haaaaaahh!'. Really nice timing!
@scheree Nice job, dude! I really like what you did with the continue screen!
@Knicker_Bottoms This translates to "Exhale" :D
@Knicker_Bottoms This is serious business.
@GrittySugar Thanks! :)
@Dshanaur Yeah, it's pretty exciting! I hope we get to see it soonish!
@Dshanaur Sure thing! It looks rad! :D
@faalinetweets That pause kills me. My need to inhale is mighty.
@Dshanaur Yeah, it looks awesome! Nice job! I really love the way it looks, it's cool that you thought outside of the box.
@faalinetweets this is actually extremely therapeutic.
@Buttersphere a worthy trade.
@CountZachulaaa okay. This looks incredible.
When I'm inking frames I feel like a sniper because I spend half of my time holding my breath to steady my hand.
@Dshanaur wow! The technique here is super sweet! Are those scanned parts that you've rigged?
@hennygoransson this is so great! Did you freehand those lines or use the pen tool, because they are so clean and smooth and lovely!
@PattenPending this is gonna be so amazing. I want to be in pizza space.
@GrittySugar hahahahahaha!!!!! That end pose!! Stellar!
@TopSpinTheFuzzy @planetrazzmataz also the timing of the plant smacking the wall is bloody masterful.
@moopdrea these are so nice. The turnarounds in particular are really beautiful. The attention to details re the mouth shapes is ver cool.
@TopSpinTheFuzzy @planetrazzmataz gaaaah! AMAZING work! I adore the design of the characters and your posing is so STROOOONG!
I love this so much. https://t.co/Yh6S2rnI2V
@alexa_doodles Thank you very very much!! :D
@egoraptor Omigosh - thanks so much for the follow, dude! You're a hero! I love your art, music and comedy. Keep on being your awesome self!
@PaperbagTweet Dude! Thank you so much! And thank you for the follow - I love your work, so it means a lot. I'm a big admirer!.
@michaeldoigart Thanks for being my one man production studio, Doigleberg - you give me the time to focus on animating! Best support ever.
@Simon_Appel Thanks so much!!
@hennygoransson I'm there.
@TakoPancakes Thank you, dude!
@_FreddyUlate Any and all Crush 40 songs are totally applicable in this situation
@Ludolik @michaeldoigart How sad that it will all end in tragedy! Though the episode has now been immortalised in remix form! ;D
@moopdrea @michaeldoigart Omigosh, thank you SO much! Mike's responsible for all the colours and bgs. Hold judgment till you see it, haha :p
@_FreddyUlate GUESS WHAT LIES AHEAD ONLY ONE WAY TO FIND OUUUUT!
@AtroxChobatsu @michaeldoigart Thanks a million! That's like.... The animator's dream compliment! :D
@michaeldoigart is making my animation look cool for #animateagrump ! https://t.co/SlkmeVGGmH
Inking frames at the speed of sound! Got three days to go gotta FOLLOW MY RAINBOW! https://t.co/LYrqEwXNFO
@KurvosVicky @DeviantArt @myanimelist Thanks, dude!
@KurvosVicky @DeviantArt @myanimelist Feel free to add me on facebook or email me! I'm often busy, but I enjoy a good discussion!
@KurvosVicky @DeviantArt @myanimelist Yeah - I agree. Equality goes both ways!
@KurvosVicky @DeviantArt @myanimelist No, it's cool! I like hearing about these topics - I'm super interested! :)
@KurvosVicky @DeviantArt @myanimelist I think mainstream western animation has a long way to go before it starts being truly progressive.
@KurvosVicky @DeviantArt @myanimelist I'll give that a read! I agree that this character type isn't explored much at all outside of anime.
@KurvosVicky @DeviantArt I see what you're saying! How do you feel about sexualised anime male characters, as in 'Y… https://t.co/oqfNzgiybP
@KurvosVicky @DeviantArt But you think male characters should be fair game to oversexualize too, is that what you're saying?
@KurvosVicky @DeviantArt You don't think? There are quite a few lads in animation I think are quite sexy :D
@KurvosVicky @DeviantArt (Skimmed it just now and already nodding about your points on Moana - had a big rant about that the other day)
@KurvosVicky @DeviantArt Thanks very much for the link - I'll give it a read, as I'm a big believer in expressive female designs!
@stitchfeather Thank you, dude! :)
@KurvosVicky Dude, I'm totally with you! That stuff drives me crazy, too. The gals from same story as this guy are also heavily stylised :D
@pancakeser @SovietGamesVNS Awesome! Beautiful background, really fun to work with! It's on Steam, too! I'll give it a play, thanks!
It's #cutiesaturday again! https://t.co/z9nA9bUBEm
@pancakeser I was wondering what it was! I found it on google images but couldn't find the source. Is it a Visual Novel game or something?
@shavostars it's okay, I am also a lie - a friend drew mine, too u_u your work is fantastic though, so I think you can get away with it! :D
@kimkoikoi ack! The curse of improvement - being able to see past mistakes! We'll never be happy! :D It's such a beautiful piece, though
@kimkoikoi Aw man, that means a lot! It was a lot of fun to do! Your Kiki animation - was the last section straight ahead? So much momentum!
@PuccaNoodles Thanks a million! Your work is so cool! Gorgeous drawing skills!
@elbormes It's a gunwand! :D
@kimkoikoi @RubberNinja WOAH! Wooooooooaaaaah! WOOOOWAAAH! This is gorgeous! Amazing work. That run & the timing on the antic is beautiful!
@RubberNinja Duuuuude! Thanks so much for the follow! You're awesome! Can't wait to see more #Gameoverse ruffs. It looks incredible so far.
@Shanooloo Be all like 'It's meeeee!' and then wink twice and give me the thumbs up. I'll memorise the code! :D
@PattenPending Of course! Thanks so much. :) Everyone is really kind.
@k7movingdoodles Thanks a million dude! Your work is awesome, so it means a lot!!
@Shanooloo Omigosh! Is Sinead your RL name? Let's hang out! I'm sure I'll recognize you when I see you. I pass so many peeps on the stairs!
New followers! I appreciate each and every one of you - I wanted to thank you all individually, but there isn't tim… https://t.co/jD4GCJ4QVc
@_MilaYin Thank you! I really appreciate the kind words, and I'm super happy you like it!
@siskavard @RubberNinja You're so welcome! Just awesome.
@wontonssoup @RubberNinja dude, nice!! Lovely work.
@siskavard @RubberNinja This is so amazing. Fantastic animation!
@LandsharkRAWR @RubberNinja Those smears! They're sweeeeeeet!
@sand_011897 thank you dude!
@StudioYobi I'm really glad it did! :)
@Lemondaurora wow thank you so much. It means a lot!
@isaactorres290 thanks so much for the follow!!
@Sprouteeh heya! Thank you very much for the follow !
@matheushintate thank you very muchly for the follow, duuuude!
@FOXAR_ thanks for the follow! Hail Miyazaki!!
@_HannaGeorge_ thanks for the follow! It's really cool of you!
@curiousertea your art is so cool! I love it! Thank you for the follow!
@RubberNinja thanks so much for the retweet! I really love what you've started here!
@periiwnkle that's really awesome of you! :D
@Jerzy @michaeldoigart @LeanIntoArt wow, thank you so much! We'll give it a listen when I get back! Hahaha, it's 'Doyg' but we don't mind!
@scissorgoat so happy you like it! Thank you!!
@StudioYobi heya! Thank you for the follow!
@rosealune thanks very much for the follow!
@AstrophileArts hey!! Thank you so much for the follow!
@KierPix thank you so much for the follow!
@Lemondaurora ooh your work is so cool! Thank you for the follow!
@jellial thank you for the follow - your art is mm mm!!
@periiwnkle thanks for the follow very much!
@starcre8tor thank you for the folloooooow!! <3
@WTFSociety505 @RubberNinja oh, man! thank you so much! I'll keep working my butt off
@starcre8tor that means a lot! :)
@Shanooloo hey! Thank you for the follow - I see you're a dubliner too, who loves animation! We should hang out sometime. Your art is great!
@stitchfeather thanks a million for the follow and the retweet! I really appreciate it!
@noitibmar heya! Thank you for the follow- that lightning animation is bonkers! So cool!
@motionandtime thank you very much for the follow and the retweet!
@ethanirons8 hey, thanks very much for the follow!
@AhLaToad thank you for the follow! Your art is amazing!
@scissorgoat hey! Thank you for the follow!
@planetrazzmataz heya! Thank you very much for the follow!
@starcre8tor thank you! When you get into an empty room, don't you just want to jump all over everything!?
